casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2002- 1407. Coolidge v. Riverdale Local School Dist.

Hancock App. No. 5-01-42, 2002-Ohio-3401. Reported at 100 Ohio St.3d 141, 2003-Ohio-5357, 797 N.E.2d 61. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.

Hildebrandt and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent. Lee H. Hildebrandt Jr., J., of the First Appellate District, sitting for Cook, J.
